body.name: ANXRE Auto Face Tracking Tripod 360 Rotation【Newest Version】 No App Required Auto Face Tracking Tripod for Cell Phone Rotating Compatible with 4''-7'' iPhone Android Phone Holder for Vlog Live Stream
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 27 mins
features: 【360° Accurate Face Tracking & Intelligent Gesture Control】Auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation adopts intelligent AI system technology and optical lenses, which can quickly and accurately recognize facial movements (3-10 inch). You can adjust the pitch angle of face tracking tripod according to sitting/standing. The face tracking tripod for iphone is perfect for influencers and streamers to capture creative videos and photos with ease. "👌" gesture to start tracking, "🖐️" gesture to pause.

【Detachable 360° Rotatable Phone Holder & Widely Compatible with 4"-7" Cell Phone】ANXRE 360 tripod for cell phone rotating securely holds iphone, samsung, and android smartphones ranging from 4" to 7", even with bulky cases. The moving tripod for iphone features 360° rotation and 360° neck swivel for multi-angle shooting, which is great for content creators. Besides, the detachable phone holder of rotating tripod for iphone offers a more convenient shooting experience.

【Upgraded Buttons & Easy to Use without App】ANXRE focus is not only building quality auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation ,but also with the content creater's ease in mind,so we've add 2 buttons designed- gesture button and 360° rotation button. ①the palm control button of auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation-stop or start the gesture recognition.②360° panoramic rotation button of phone holder-easily capture creative videos without adjust your phone.

【Built-in Rechargeable Battery＆Detachable Remote】 ANXRE moving tripod is powered by a built-in rechargeable battery and charges through a USB port. Once fully charged, the face tracking tripod can last for 5-7 hours of continuous use.The remote of 360 phone tripod rotating automatic is easy to pair,work range up to 10m(30 feet) and support 20,000+ selfies. The motion tracking tripod is an excellent gift for friends, family, and loved ones who enjoy capturing and sharing moments.

【Standard 1/4" Screw Thread for Multi-Scenario Usage】Featuring a standard 1/4” screw thread at the bottom,auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation can be mounted on a tripod to offer different shooting heights and angles for video recording. Besides, mounted on the provided base tripod that follows your movement can used as desktop stand.The face recognition tripod is perfect for vloggers, youtubers, travellers，group photos,video conferences, product demos, and more.

【What Will You Get & After-Sales Guarantee】 If you have any problem about ANXRE auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation,please contact us and ANXRE service team will help you in 24H. Package includes: 1 x auto face tracking tripod 360 rotation+1 x USB Cable + 1 x user manual+2 year warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This tripod was easy to use right out of the box. Easy to set up. Works just as described, following me around the room. Only negative is my phone is almost too big and I have to take it out of the case. But overall I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Value for money easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this product 💕💕💕💕 I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not track through phone
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This device tracks through the camera on the device itself not on your phone. So you can turn your phone so that the higher resolution cameras are on your face. Just put a mirror behind so you can make sure that the picture is good because it’s the little camera on the device that’s tracking your face.That was like the most important thing to know for me because I thought like a gimbal was going to connect through the phone and it does it. It uses that one device camera not the one on your phone.The device camera is not recording you it is tracking your face. And if you have a longer face, if you raise your eyebrow, it will actually move to where you moved your eyebrow.If you have an Apple Watch, you could use your Apple Watch to make sure the picture is good otherwise it is gonna take a little bit of finagling to make sure the picture is good. If you use your rear cameras, that’s what I would say the biggest downfall of this device is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Literally the best auto tracking face mount, i use it for all my time-lapses and videos. It comes in handy when I’m not having to constant shift or pivot another non auto tracking mount. I especially love that it can connect to a tripod. That makes it even better than before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as described! Pleased with its performance. My kids don't like to help me out by recording when I make body care products...this eliminates the middle man

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Qu’il fasse exactement ce qui est décrit dans les spécifications
reviews.reviewText: J’aime la facilité et la précision de cet article. Je le recommande très fortement.

I had my doubts about this device. They say it tracks your face and it does actually track very well. It only tracks in the horizontal plane so you do need to align it vertically.Once you set it up though, it follows you really well with just a slight delay when you change directions. You could use this for a video chat and not be locked to one spot or you could use it for content creation like Youtube to track you as you move around in your home/kitchen, whatever you're doing. The tracking is a bit "notchy". It's not a continuous flow track, you move, it moves and stops. Then if you move again, it starts moving. It doesn't speed up or slow down or track continuously like the "eagle eye" in expensive gimbals.There is a remote to turn the unit on/off and to start/stop the tracking and also recording function if you pair to your phone with bluetooth.The base has a slightly larger footprint than the body though it could be a little wider, it was a bit tippy if the phone wasn't mounted in the center.Battery life seemed good, a single charge gave me at least 30 minutes of tracking and still it had more battery time.

This is a pretty cool stand. It is able to track your face and move along to you. You can hook it up to your phone with Bluetooth but it works without it too. The tracking works fairly well , you can’t really walk around too quickly but if you are seated and move a bit this is perfect. The battery lasts a while. You can have your phone vertically or in portrait mode. Would recommend this, it is a good value for what it does.
